ISSUE.TITLE: Support MauiService REST API via HTTP backend
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: The [MauiService](https://github.com/NatLibFi/mauiservice) REST API returns results as a JSON object that looks like this: ```json { "results": [{ "uri": "http://www.yso.fi/onto/yso/p12345", "label": "lastenvaunut", "score": 0.88 }] } ``` The `http` backend should recognize this format. Also need to make sure that limit and threshold parameters are properly passed to MauiService.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: make specifying analyzer optional, for projects that don't actually need it

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Initial support for MauiService REST API. Fixes #102
